# Configure Revenue Recognition Timing

Learn how to add and configure a custom option for the Revenue Recognition Timing setting.

To add a custom option for the Revenue Recognition Timing setting, do the following:

1.  Navigate to the Revenue Recognition Timing section.
2.  Click the Add New button.
    A new row is displayed for you to add a custom option.

3.  In the Field Value column of the new row, enter an option name for the new custom option that you want to add. ![Configure Revenue Recognition Timing](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/d3ab3bd4-a1c0-48a3-abe8-9f136a1d2ba8?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..2ntbRqRcnSzv7EFPP8B90J6TbBW2I_lqRMk8q5lXYqw)
4.  Ensure the Active column in the new row is ticked so the new custom option is active.
5.  Click the ![Tick icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/24e1fc93-4131-4dd9-89f1-6160369450f1?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..UHXOGD17Rf1vJYNjqU1NH5pefuLGAa5DHQKJNxDRmrA) icon under Actions to save the new option.
6.  Click Save in the dialog box to confirm the addition.

The custom option is created. You cannot edit, deactivate, or remove a custom option.
